quote_last: I’ll just send him a tiny friendly message, nothing flirtatious, just to restore good relations.
title: Bridget Jones's Diary
author: Helen Fielding

quote_first: He whistles in the shower. It is
quote_last: and he is ready for the off.
title: Trumpet
author: Jackie Kay

quote_first: I reach for my phone and call Sam. His number is still disconnected. I plug in the USB again, make a fresh attempt at going through his files. My coffee grows cold and my back aches as I stare at the screen. It doesn’t amount to anything. I glanced at the time.
title: The Ex-Husband
author: Karen Hamilton
